titles.title: Fair Housing Amendments Act of 1996
To amend the Fair Housing Act to prevent certain abuses.

bill.summary: 9/27/1996--Introduced. Fair Housing Amendments Act of 1996 - Amends the Fair Housing Act with respect to discriminatory housing practices to: (1) limit civil litigation to intending tenants; (2) require the practice to be intentionally discriminatory; (3) exempt from liability publishers (such as newspapers) that reasonably rely on presented advertising material; and (4) award litigation costs to prevailing parties.
